title: The richest people in America as of 2019
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and lowest at Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX).
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars of Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) is 5.87% smaller than the maximum value at Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com).
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in the y axis.
Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 20 number of Months.
Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars and Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) has the lowest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The second highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the Month Bill Gates (Microsoft).
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 108.7.

The Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has the highest Net worth in billion U.S. dollars, followed by Bill Gates (Microsoft), and Warren Buffett (Berkshire Hathaway). Down to the Month Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) which is the lowest.
Over the past 20 Months, the Net worth in billion U.S. dollars has decreased.
Similar Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is found in Month Charles Koch (Koch Industries), and David Koch (Koch Industries).
The Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) has 2.52 times more Net worth in billion U.S. dollars than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 1039.3.
